title: Zócalo de Chilpancingo
description: The Zócalo of Chilpancingo is the city’s main square, surrounded by historic buildings, shops, and cultural spaces. It’s a central spot for social gatherings, festivals, and enjoying the local atmosphere.

title: Guerrero Regional Museum
description: The Guerrero Regional Museum showcases the history, art, and culture of the region. Visitors can explore exhibits that highlight Chilpancingo’s heritage and the traditions of Guerrero.

title: Parque Margarita
description: Parque Margarita is a green space in Chilpancingo offering recreational areas, walking paths, and spots to relax. It’s an ideal place for families and visitors to enjoy nature in the heart of the city.
